headline: Immigration Enforcement Agent
summary: Experienced Logistics with a demonstrated history of working in the military industry. Skilled in Microsoft Word, Government, Team Building, English, and Microsoft Excel. Strong operations professional with a Master's degree focused in Criminal Justice/Law Enforcement Administration from Saint Leo University.

defaultPosition.description:
Conduct removals and/or the escorting of aliens to their country of citizenship.
Perform detention program responsibilities, assuring detainee care (physical, mental, and civil rights)
Arrest and process for removal any persons encountered who are not authorized to be in or work in the United States.
Participates in investigations of immigration cases, presenting facts to the appropriate functional element or to a United States Attorney for consideration for prosecution.
defaultPosition.title: Law Enforcement Officer
